pages.text: Private Events Book The Riviera for Your Next Event Transform our 1930’s art deco setting to fit any style of event. From weddings to team building workshops, we’re here to celebrate alongside you. Have questions? Contact our team through the form below or reach out to our Sales Team directly. | sales@charlestonplace.com 843-724-8410. Ignite the night. Welcome to The Riviera. Find a Show Live Entertainment with Historic Charm Find a Show Join us before the show at our Rooftop Terrace Bar Find a Show The Riviera is an intimate 600-seat music, arts, and comedy performance venue located in the heart of downtown Charleston at the corner of King and Market Streets.
